subject: Re: [junit] How to design code coverage tool?
msgSnippet: ... You might want to take a look at the source code for GroboUtils, EMMA, and Cobertura. Those are all open source Java code coverage tools. All of the above
messageBody:
On 10/30/05, ahmed_cs1985 <ahmed_cs1985@...> wrote:
> Im a new member in this group. Im workning in a graduation project for
> developing a java code coverage tool & I was wandering if someone can
> help me & give me some names of books that can help me in the design
> of a java code coverage tool?

You might want to take a look at the source code for GroboUtils, EMMA,
and Cobertura. Those are all open source Java code coverage tools. All
of the above tools rely on bytecode manipulation for instrumenting the
code with logging statements. There's also a commercial tool named
Cenqua Clover which (the last time I looked) does the instrumentation
on source code instead.

-Lasse-
